attributes.action: divert a proportion of the £3.4 billion raised annually through residential stamp duty directly to the Local Authorities in which the duty is raised.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Each year billions of pounds is raised through residential stamp duty (£3.4 billion in 2005/06), which is basically a property tax, but it all goes straight to the Treasury. If a proportion went directly to the Local Authorities in which the duty was raised, it would help alleviate the financial pressures on increasing rates of Council Tax.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
